attributes.action: Theresa May to spend a weekend working with front line police
attributes.additional_details:
I believe that if Theresa May is to continue to make decisions regarding the police forces of the nation, she should spend a friday and saturday night working alongside the boys in blue, rather than against them. I do not mean a few days observing from afar, or in a control room. Ms May needs to see front line action, maybe night club brawls, rtcs, sudden deaths?

Policing is not an easy job, as Ms May seems to believe. Maybe once she has put on that stab vest and been in the only response car available heading to a 20 person fight, she may understand...
